lead_paragraph: Jurors could not reach a decision in the most serious charges against Kahton Anderson — including murder, manslaughter and others — after the boy, then 14, killed a 39-year-old father last year.

headline.print_headline: Partial Verdict for Teenager Whose Stray Bullet Killed Man
headline.main: Partial Verdict for Teenager Whose Stray Bullet Killed Man on Brooklyn Bus

snippet: Jurors could not reach a decision in the most serious charges against Kahton Anderson — including murder, manslaughter and others — after the boy, then 14, killed a 39-year-old father last year.
abstract: Jury in State Supreme Court in Brooklyn says it cannot reach decision in second-degree murder charge against Kahton Anderson, who was 14 when he shot and killed Brooklyn man Angel Rojas on a bus in 2014.
